Name: Hilton Honors American Express Card
Rewards_rate:
Earn 7X Hilton Honors Bonus Points for each dollar of eligible purchases charged directly with hotels and resorts within the Hilton portfolio.
Earn 5X Points per dollar on purchases at U.S. restaurants, at U.S. supermarkets, and at U.S. gas stations.
Earn 3X Points for all other eligible purchases on your Card.
Pros:
You can redeem points for hotel stays, airfare, car rentals, cruises, shopping, dining or charity.
There are no blackout dates or capacity controls for rewards bookings.
Cons:
People who donâ€™t often stay and shop at Hilton properties may not see enough benefits to justify using this card.
The value you get when transferring your points to an airline partner is much lower than when you redeem for a hotel stay.
